62 class Eint : public Periph {
63 public:

65  static int ports();

73 
74  bool value(void){
75  eint_attr_t a;
76  attr(&a);
77  return a.value != 0;
78  }
79 
80  inline bool get(void){ return value(); }

83  int setaction(int channel, int event, mcu_callback_t callback, void * context){
84  eint_action_t action;
85  action.channel = channel;
86  action.event = event;
87  action.callback = callback;
88  action.context = context;
89  return setaction(action);
90  }
91 
93  int setattr(uint8_t pin_assign = 0, uint16_t mode = Pin::INPUT | Pin::PULLUP){
94  eint_attr_t attr;
95  attr.pin_assign = pin_assign;
96  attr.mode = mode;
97  return setattr(&attr);
98  }
99 
101  int init(uint8_t pin_assign = 0, uint16_t mode = Pin::INPUT | Pin::PULLUP){
102  if( open() < 0 ){
103  return -1;
104  }
105  return setattr(pin_assign, mode);
106  }
107 
109  enum {
110  EVENT_UNCONFIGURED = EINT_ACTION_EVENT_UNCONFIGURED,
111  EVENT_RISING = EINT_ACTION_EVENT_RISING,
112  EVENT_FALLING = EINT_ACTION_EVENT_FALLING,
113  EVENT_BOTH = EINT_ACTION_EVENT_BOTH,
114  EVENT_LOW = EINT_ACTION_EVENT_LOW,
115  EVENT_HIGH = EINT_ACTION_EVENT_HIGH
116  };
